message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think you'll find it incredibly useful.  I'm asking for $200 to start. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $120 for it.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $200 represents the true value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $170. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $170 is still a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $140 for the product.
